import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; {/* Hero Section */}

About FarmFresh

We're on a mission to connect communities with fresh, local produce while supporting sustainable farming practices across Bangladesh.

{/* Mission & Vision */}

Our Mission

To revolutionize the way people access fresh, organic produce by creating a direct connection between local farmers and consumers. We believe in supporting sustainable agriculture while providing communities with the freshest, most nutritious food possible.

Through our platform, we empower farmers to reach wider markets, earn fair prices for their produce, and build lasting relationships with customers who value quality and sustainability.

{/* Values */}

Our Values

These core values guide everything we do and shape our commitment to farmers and customers alike.

Sustainability

We promote eco-friendly farming practices that protect our environment for future generations.

Community

Building strong relationships between farmers and consumers to create thriving local communities.

Quality

Ensuring the highest standards of freshness, taste, and nutritional value in every product.

{/* Stats */}

Our Impact

Making a difference in communities across Bangladesh

500+
Active Farmers
10,000+
Happy Customers
50+
Districts Covered
2,000+
Products Available
{/* Team */}

Meet Our Team

Passionate individuals working together to transform agriculture and food distribution.

Ahmed Rahman

CEO & Founder

Former agricultural engineer with 15+ years of experience in sustainable farming.

Fatima Khan

CTO

Technology leader passionate about using innovation to solve agricultural challenges.

Karim Hassan

Head of Operations

Supply chain expert ensuring efficient delivery from farm to table.

{/* Contact CTA */}

Get in Touch

Have questions about our platform or want to learn more about partnering with us?

Contact Us Join as Farmer
{/* Footer */}

With a naturally rich golden hue and high protein content, it's ideal for baking, grinding into flour, or preparing nutritious traditional meals. Grown organically by Abdul Rahman at Farm 35, this wheat is free from synthetic chemicals and processed with care to retain its wholesome quality. Whether you're making rotis, bread, or porridges, it ensures both taste and nourishment.", "farmer": { "name": "Abdul Rahman", "farmName": "Farm 35", "location": "Rajshahi, Bangladesh" }, "images": [ "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1689118398153-d24137d57e12?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8N3x8Z29sZGVuJTIwd2hlYXR8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1689118402130-ad5a13556b75?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTZ8fGdvbGRlbiUyMHdoZWF0fGVufDB8fDB8fHww", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1553673324-aad5dc09f90f?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MjJ8fGdvbGRlbiUyMHdoZWF0fGVufDB8fDB8fHww", "https://plus.unsplash.com/premium_photo-1730191648801-51dda0c95368?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8NDF8fGdvbGRlbiUyMHdoZWF0fGVufDB8fDB8fHww", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1588274061514-fe2fe8e9d645?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Njd8fGdvbGRlbiUyMHdoZWF0fGVufDB8fDB8fHww" ], "stock": 182, "features": [ "100% organically grown without chemical fertilizers", "Sun-dried and hand-harvested for maximum nutrient retention", "Naturally high in protein and dietary fiber", "Ideal for grinding into whole wheat flour (atta)", "Supports local farmers and sustainable agriculture", "Packed fresh and delivered with zero preservatives", "Perfect for traditional recipes like roti, bread, and porridge" ], "rating": 5, "reviewCount": 49, "isOrganic": true, "purchaseCount": 306, "storageInstructions": "Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container to preserve freshness. Avoid exposure to moisture and direct sunlight. Shelf life is up to 12 months if stored properly.", "nutritionalInformation": { "servingSize": "100g", "calories": 340, "protein": "13g", "carbohydrates": "72g", "fiber": "10g", "fat": "2.5g", "iron": "3.6mg", "vitaminB1": "0.5mg", "gluten": "Contains gluten" }, "createdAt": "2025-07-28T02:30:53.328Z", "updatedAt": "2025-07-28T14:39:00.000Z", "reviews": [ { "reviewer": "Ayesha Siddique", "date": "2025-07-20", "rating": 5, "comment": "Excellent quality wheat! The flour made from this wheat is fresh and perfect for traditional breads." }, { "reviewer": "Tanvir Hasan", "date": "2025-07-22", "rating": 5, "comment": "I love that it's organic and locally sourced. The grain is full of flavor and cooks well." }, { "reviewer": "Sabina Rahman", "date": "2025-07-25", "rating": 4, "comment": "Very good wheat. The texture is great and it stays fresh longer than other brands." } ] }, { "_id": "688725de224d2f673382eab9", "name": "Green Cauliflower", "category": "Vegetables", "price": 108, "unit": "kg", "description": "Green Cauliflower is a vibrant, nutrient-dense vegetable known for its unique color and slightly sweeter, nuttier taste compared to white cauliflower.
